translation.it: Ti prendevano in giro, ridevano di te e di me!

translation.en: And you've been here for weeks. How do you not see that?
translation.it: Sei qui da settimane e non l'hai capito?

translation.en: I see it. I'm not stupid. I--
But-- But I have to be myself. That's all I know how to do.
translation.it: ma devo essere me stessa, è tutto ciò che so fare.

translation.en: Well, just stop doing it.
For, like, one day just stop being you and just be normal.
translation.it: Almeno un giorno, non essere te, sii solo normale.

translation.en: Diego, we used to be so close. Why are things so different now?
translation.it: Diego, eravamo amici, perché ora è tutto diverso?

translation.en: Because, Dora, this isn't the jungle, where you can just do whatever you want
translation.it: Perché qui non siamo nella giungla dove puoi fare come ti pare,

translation.en: and be best friends with a monkey.
translation.it: e avere una scimmia per amico.

translation.en: Okay? This is high school. It's life or death.
translation.it: Questo è il liceo, o vivi o soccombi.

translation.en: And it was hard enough already without having to take care of the class weirdo.
translation.it: Ed era già difficile senza dovermi occupare della stramba della classe.

translation.en: Okay.
Sometimes we all need to hide. No?
translation.it: A volte abbiamo tutti bisogno di nasconderci, no?

translation.en: [sighs] I guess, I never felt lonely
translation.it: Credo di non aver mai sofferto la solitudine

translation.en: when I was by myself in the jungle.
translation.it: quando mi trovavo da sola nella giungla.

translation.en: But now that I'm surrounded by kids…
translation.it: Ma adesso che sono sempre in mezzo a tanti ragazzini…

translation.en: I feel alone all the time.
-I think Diego hates me. -Ah. [clicks tongue]
You are familia, mi amor. Huh?
-Abuelita. -Hmm?
Am I a weirdo?
no more than the rest of us.
That's not a "no."
Let's get you some frijolitos, okay?
[man] Okay, here's the scavenger hunt list.
translation.it: Ok, ecco la lista della caccia al tesoro.

translation.en: You know the drill.
Team up in groups of four and go get some photos.
translation.it: Formate squadre da quattro e fate le vostre foto.

translation.en: Oh, and if anybody needs me, I'll be in the cafeteria…
translation.it: Se mi cercate, sarò al bar…

translation.en: questioning my life choices.
translation.it: a interrogarmi sulle mie scelte di vita.

translation.en: -[Dora] Can I be on your team? -[Sammy] Do you guys need a fourth person?
translation.it: Posso stare con voi? Vi manca la quarta?

translation.en: [Diego] Hey, guys, us four?
[Dora] Can I be on your team?
translation.it: Posso stare in squadra con voi?

translation.en: -[Diego] Hey, guys. -[Dora] Can I be on your team?
[scoffs] You've got to be kidding me.
Of course, this is happening.
There's something really icy happening between you two.
translation.it: Percepisco un gran gelo tra voi due.

translation.en: -Was it the Disco Dork-a dance? -Well, I'm glad you brought it up--
translation.it: È per la Disco Nerd-Dora Dance? - Grazie di averne parlato… - Scherzavo, non mi interessa.

translation.en: I'm just kidding, I don't actually care.
translation.it: - Grazie di averne parlato… - Scherzavo, non mi interessa.

translation.en: Okay. "Find something that's more than 1,000 years old."
translation.it: "Trovate un reperto che abbia più di 1.000 anni.

translation.en: "Oldest relic gets two extra points." Come on!
translation.it: Se è ancora più antico, due punti in più." Andiamo!

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Could you be any bossier?
-Excuse me? "Bossier." Really? -Yeah.
What's next? "Shrill?" Or am I being too difficult for you?
translation.it: Sono anche "isterica"? O troppo "complicata" per te?

translation.en: You left that out of your Misogyny 101 class.
translation.it: Studia meglio se non vuoi essere rimandato in Misoginia.

translation.en: What? Do you have something to say?
translation.it: Che c'è? Hai qualcosa da dire?

translation.en: I'm just so scared right now.
translation.it: Ho tanta paura, in questo momento.

translation.en: [Dora] Hey, what about this Egyptian exhibit?
translation.it: Che ne dite della mostra sugli Egizi?

translation.en: Anything Egyptian would be the oldest relic by far.
translation.it: I reperti egizi devono essere i più antichi.

translation.en: -Guys? -Psst.
I think I may be able to help you.
Overheard about your scavenger hunt.
translation.it: Ho sentito della caccia al tesoro.

translation.en: You were looking at the Egyptian posters.
-When does it open? -Oh, that's the problem, two weeks.
translation.it: - Quando si inaugura? - Purtroppo tra due settimane.

translation.en: They're unloading it today in the basement.
Look…
If it means that much to you, there may be a way for you to get down there.
translation.it: se è così importante, forse posso farti vedere dove sono.

translation.en: [Sammy] This best not be some wild goose chase.
translation.it: Non caveremo un ragno dal buco.

translation.en: I sure hope it is. I love chasing wild geese.
translation.it: Io spero di sì. Adoro i ragni, sono simpaticissimi.

translation.en: Until you catch one. Then it is not fun.
translation.it: Ma evita di catturarli, non è il caso.

translation.en: A caught goose is just the meanest!
Well, it's grouped by origin, so
translation.it: Sono ordinati per epoca, quindi… gli antichi Egizi dovrebbero trovarsi da questa parte.

translation.en: the Ancient Egyptian stuff should be in this aisle.
translation.it: gli antichi Egizi dovrebbero trovarsi da questa parte.

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh, no, she's been caught!
And I can totally explain why I'm here.
-Someone's coming. -Come with me, miss.
Hide! Hide!
-Where? -There, there, there!
Look what I found sneaking around.
translation.it: Guarda chi ho trovato a curiosare.

translation.en: Ah. An interloper.
A thief.
Or maybe an explorer.
-Hola, Dora. -Hi, I'm Dora, and--
translation.it: - Hola, Dora. - Ciao, sono Dora e…

translation.en: -Wait, you already knew my name? -[footsteps approach]
Hey. You gotta help me.
I guess we win the scavenger hunt.
translation.it: Abbiamo vinto noi la caccia al tesoro.

translation.en: What? Hey, no.
Let me go!
-Hey, no! -Wait, wait, wait, wait.
-[Diego] What's going on? -[Randy] Is this a scavenger hunt?
translation.it: - Che succede? - È ancora una caccia al tesoro?

translation.en: [Dora] What are you guys doing in here?
Sleep tight, Dora, and when you wake up,
you will help us find your parents, and then Parapata.
translation.it: ci aiuterai a trovare i tuoi genitori e poi… Parapata.

translation.en: What's happening?
Where are we?
I think we're being unloaded from a plane.
translation.it: Credo che ci stiano scaricando da un aereo.

translation.en: We're not on a plane. We can't--
translation.it: Non siamo su un aereo, non è…

translation.en: Oh, my God, we're on a plane! Oh--
We've left the country without ID. We need to alert the US consulate.
translation.it: Siamo partiti senza documenti, dobbiamo allertare il consolato.

translation.en: Dora, what happened?
-They're treasure hunters? -Why did I take Mandarin?
translation.it: Cacciatori di tesori? Perché studio cinese? Che state dicendo?

translation.en: -What are you guys saying? -[whirring, clattering]
translation.it: Perché studio cinese? Che state dicendo?

translation.en: We gotta get out of here.
Oh, look, Dora brought a knife on the field trip, everybody.
translation.it: Guardate, Dora ha portato un coltello in gita.

translation.en: I see three mercenaries. Armed.
Wait, there's a fourth.
I think he saw me.
-He's coming for us. -Ah!
Okay. I am not here. I'm an avatar. [whimpers]
translation.it: Io non sono qui, sono un avatar!

translation.en: Dora! It is you!
-Who are you? -I'm a friend of your parents.
translation.it: - Chi sei tu? - Un amico dei tuoi genitori.

translation.en: I'm rescuing you, Dora!
Come with me if you want to live--
translation.it: Vieni con me se vuoi vivere!

translation.en: -[Sammy] Where did he go? -Did… did he die?
I'm okay! I'm okay. I need your help.
translation.it: Sto bene. Mi serve il vostro aiuto,

translation.en: But we have to run. Now!
-[woman] Boss! -Get them!
[Sammy] My parents did not sign a permission slip for the jungle!
translation.it: I miei non hanno firmato l'autorizzazione per la giungla!

translation.en: Why are we here?
Where's the museum? Why, why, why?
translation.it: Dov'è il museo? Perché, perché, perché?

translation.en: -[Dora] How do we get out of here? -I don't know!
translation.it: Come usciamo da qui? Non lo so.

translation.en: Getting you out of the box was as far as my plan went.
translation.it: Il mio piano si limitava a tirarvi fuori dalla cassa.

translation.en: Huh! Swiper, at the ready!
Whatever happens, get that map.
translation.it: Prendi quella mappa ad ogni costo.

translation.en: Swiper, yes, swiping.
-[Diego] What kind of rescue is this? -It's the only one you've got.
translation.it: Che razza di salvataggio è? L'unico a disposizione!

translation.en: [Dora] Here. Let me try.
Hola. What the--
[Dora] Hey! That fox just swiped my map!
translation.it: Quella volpe mi ha rubato la mappa!

translation.en: Where is it? Where is it? Where is it?
What part of, "The fox just swiped my map" don't you understand? Come on, help me!
translation.it: Cos'è che non avete capito? Aiutatemi!

translation.en: Gotcha! There you are, my little friend.
No swiping, you… you swiper!
She's amazing.
-[Swiper screams] -Oh, shoot!
Man! I'm stuck upside-down.
translation.it: Accidenti, sono bloccato a testa in giù.

translation.en: Swiper, no-- [gasps]
-Good job, Swiper. -I know, man.
Get her!
[Diego] Dora!
-Now what do we do? -Come on, come on!
-Where did our rescuer go? -[Randy] He ran away!
translation.it: - Dov'è il nostro soccorritore? - È scappato!

translation.en: -Get in! -[Swiper] Open this door, man!
-[man] Get in! -[Swiper] I'm not joking, man!
Viper, get the truck! Don't let them escape!
translation.it: Viper, al furgone! Non fateli scappare!

translation.en: -Hold on! -[Diego] Oh!
[man] Sorry!
Are they following?
[mercenary] Where have they gone?
This is the only road for miles. Keep your eyes peeled.
translation.it: Questa è l'unica strada, tenete gli occhi aperti.

translation.en: Not anymore. [sighs]
Are you kids okay?
-Not really. -"Not really"?
Understatement of the century.
I was just kidnapped and chased by bad guys!
translation.it: Sono stata rapita e inseguita da malintenzionati.

translation.en: And a fox with a mask! Everyone saw that, right?
translation.it: E da un volpe… Mascherata. L'avete vista?

translation.en: Like, why does that fox need to remain anonymous?
translation.it: Perché una volpe vorrebbe restare anonima?

translation.en: Who is gonna recognize one specific fox?
translation.it: Chi distingue una volpe da un'altra?

translation.en: -Mm. -How did you know my name?
You were an infant the last time I saw you.
translation.it: Eri in fasce l'ultima volta che ti vidi.

translation.en: My name is Alejandro Gutierrez. I'm a professor of ancient languages
translation.it: Mi chiamo Alejandro Gutierrez, professore di Lingue Antiche all'Università San Marcos di Lima, Perù.

translation.en: at San Marcos University in Lima, Peru.
translation.it: professore di Lingue Antiche all'Università San Marcos di Lima, Perù.

translation.en: Your parents and I were in constant contact during their time here.
translation.it: Sono rimasto sempre in contatto con i tuoi genitori quando erano qui.

translation.en: Then two weeks ago, your parents' calls stopped.
translation.it: Poi, due settimane fa, hanno smesso di chiamare.

translation.en: Since then… silencio.
-That means silence. -Yeah. I got that one.
They haven't answered any of my sat phone call for weeks, either.
translation.it: Non rispondono nemmeno a me, da settimane.

translation.en: Your father sent me this just a week before, in case I could help.
translation.it: Tuo padre mi aveva spedito questo la settimana prima.

translation.en: Ah, Papi's journal!
[Alejandro] So I came here to make sure they were okay.
Tracked them this far.
I've been staking it out, hoping for a sign from them.
translation.it: Ho battuto la zona, sperando che si facessero vivi.

translation.en: [stutters] And then I saw you poke your head out of that crate
translation.it: E poi ti ho visto sbucare dalla cassa

translation.en: and I-- I said to myself, "Dora!"
Dora the kidnapped teenager!
But how did you recognize me?
Well, you look sort of exactly the same.
translation.it: Beh, non sei cambiata di una virgola.

translation.en: But I'm afraid I have no idea where to find your parents.
translation.it: Però… temo di non sapere proprio dove trovare i tuoi genitori.

translation.en: Don't worry. I can track my parents in the jungle.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti, so come trovarli nella giungla.

translation.en: -Let's go! -Ho… Hold up.
Or we could call the local police
and-- and have them come rescue us with, like, a SWAT team.
translation.it: che manderà una squadra di SWAT a salvarci.

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah, that sounds like another solid option.
Of course!
Hello? 911? Can you please come and get us?
We're at the corner of Rain and Forest.
translation.it: Siamo all'incrocio tra Foresta e Pluviale.

translation.en: Okay, I get it! I just want to go home.
translation.it: Va bene, ho capito! Voglio solo tornare a casa.

translation.en: We're gonna die out here.
Look around you.
This is the kind of place where people die.
translation.it: la gente ci muore in posti così.

translation.en: I mean, in a way, every place is the kind of place where people die.
translation.it: In un certo senso, la gente muore in qualsiasi posto.

translation.en: -Okay, well, that's a bummer notion. -Guys, guys.
Listen, finding Dora's parents is our best chance of getting home.
translation.it: Se troviamo i genitori di Dora riusciremo a tornare a casa.

translation.en: My aunt and uncle will know what to do.
translation.it: I miei zii sapranno cosa fare.

translation.en: Dora's my cousin, I can't just let her go off with some
translation.it: Dora è mia cugina, non posso lasciarla con un tizio

translation.en: strange and anxious man we just met.
translation.it: strano e ansioso che non conosco.

translation.en: Thank you, Diego.
Now let's go find Dora's parents.
translation.it: Ora andiamo a cercare i genitori di Dora.

translation.en: [Dora] Look! In there! That's their car!
translation.it: Guarda, quella è la loro macchina!

translation.en: Here. This is it. Our family symbol.
translation.it: Eccolo, questo è il nostro simbolo di famiglia.

translation.en: -This is where they started hiking. -Are we there?
translation.it: Sono partiti da qui. Siamo arrivati?

translation.en: Where are your parents? I don't see your parents.
translation.it: Dove sono i tuoi genitori? Io non li vedo.

translation.en: We can't go any further by car.
-The jungle gets too dense. -So, how do we--
translation.it: - la giunga si infittisce. - Allora come…

translation.en: We must enter the jungle on foot.
Luckily, I prepared for this possibility.
translation.it: Per fortuna, ero preparato a questa evenienza.

translation.en: Okay, I may have gone a little overboard on supplies.
translation.it: Forse ho un po' esagerato con le scorte.

translation.en: Be my guest.
This is a legit nightmare!
I-- I'm not going in first, though. You go first, Dora. It feels right.
translation.it: Però io non vado per primo. Vai tu, Dora, è giusto così.

translation.en: [Dora] You all have nothing to worry about.
The jungle is perfectly safe!
translation.it: la giungla è un luogo perfettamente sicuro.

translation.en: Just don't touch anything. Or breathe too deeply.
translation.it: Solo, non toccate niente, e non respirate troppo.

translation.en: [Randy] Are you sure your parents went this way?
translation.it: Sicura che i tuoi siano andati di qua?

translation.en: [Sammy] Okay, what are these?
Warning signs.
Totems.
Legend tells of a deadly ancient militia
translation.it: La leggenda narra di un'antica milizia spietata,

translation.en: dedicated to protecting Parapata from outside eyes.
translation.it: incaricata di proteggere Parapata da sguardi esterni.

translation.en: No one has seen Los Guardianes Perdidos…
The Lost Guardians, for centuries.
-What was that? -Quechua.
-Ancient Inca. Impressive. -[Sammy] What does it mean?
"All those that seek Parapata…
shall surely perish."
Okay, I am ready for my parents to come and get me now.
translation.it: Ok, ora i miei genitori possono venirmi a prendere.

translation.en: [Alejandro] You have nothing to worry about.
I promise. I mean, there's no need to overreact.
translation.it: te l'assicuro. Non c'è ragione di cedere al panico.

translation.en: Get it off! Get it off! Get it off! [grunts]
And that was just an example of the dangers of overreacting.
translation.it: Questo solo per dimostrarvi quanto sia pericoloso cedere al panico.

translation.en: -[Sammy whimpers] -[Dora] You okay? Fine. Totally fine.
Hey. I found one of those red loops.
My parents' symbol.
-We must be getting close. -Oh, thank you, thank you!
We're going home.
This is my parents' camp.
Or was. I mean, this is their stuff.
translation.it: O almeno lo era, questa è la loro roba.

translation.en: -Someone's watching. -[rustling]
[Sammy] I can feel it.
-Kill it! Quickly, kill it! -Boots! Oh!
Oh, Boots, I'm so happy to see you!
translation.it: Boots, sono così felice di vederti!

translation.en: She knows this monkey?
Of course, she knows this monkey.
[sighs] Thank goodness.
-He saw them. -[Boots squeals]
Oh, sorry. Um, this is Boots. Boots, these are, um, my friends.
translation.it: Oh, scusa. Lui è Boots. Boots, ti presento i miei amici.

translation.en: -They're here to help me. -No. We're here to get saved.
translation.it: Sono qui per aiutarmi. No, siamo qui per essere salvati.

translation.en: Oh, and FYI, we are not friends.
translation.it: E per inciso, non siamo amiche.

translation.en: They did this quickly.
-See how they rushed it? -Yeah.
Still, I can track my parents better than any mercenaries.
translation.it: Però sono più brava dei mercenari a seguire le tracce dei miei genitori.

translation.en: We just have to get to them first.
Uh. May we stop for a moment? I need to do a thing.
translation.it: Possiamo fermarci un attimo? Devo fare una cosa.

translation.en: -What? -Just a thing.
What thing?
I know what this is.
-You have to poo. -[scoffs] No. That isn't it.
translation.it: - La pupù. - No, non è quello.

translation.en: Of course I have to poo! I haven't pooed in 48 hours!
translation.it: Certo che è la pupù! Non faccio la pupù da due giorni!

translation.en: I'm sweating, and every step is agony!
translation.it: Sto sudando, e ogni passo è un'agonia!

translation.en: Well, don't look at me cover your ears!
Probably should've said "cover your ears" before you said "poo" like, 47 times.
translation.it: Avresti dovuto dirci di coprirle prima di dire 47 volte "pupù".

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Dora] There's no need to be afraid.
translation.it: Non c'è nulla di cui avere paura.

translation.en: I have an idea.
-Let's turn this into a song. -Let's not.
You know what? I think it's passed.
Why don't we just go back to the group, and we can just--
translation.it: Perché non torniamo dagli altri e facciamo solo…

translation.en: Seriously? You had that in your backpack, too?
translation.it: Davvero, avevi anche quella nello zaino?

translation.en: A poo shovel.
♪ It's time to dig the poo hole ♪
translation.it: Intanto fai la buca per la pupù

translation.en: -♪ Dig, dig, dig ♪ -[Boots hums]
♪ Just grab a shovel It's a piece of cake ♪
translation.it: La spala-pupù è il mezzo più efficiente

translation.en: ♪ Make sure the hole is deep And there isn't a snake ♪
translation.it: Controlla bene che non ci sia un serpente

translation.en: ♪ I'm telling you this So you will be wiser ♪
♪ And don't forget It's a natural fertilizer ♪
translation.it: Ricorda che è un concime naturale

translation.en: I believe in you, Sammy. I believe that you can do this.
translation.it: Io credo in te, Sammy. So che puoi farcela.

translation.en: Also, medically, you have to do this.
translation.it: E da un punto di vista medico, devi farla per forza.

translation.en: -[exhales] -Okay, bye! Come on, Boots.
She's good.
There's nothing to be afraid of.
translation.it: Non c'è nulla di cui aver paura.

translation.en: Not good. Not good at all.
translation.it: Non va bene, non va per niente bene.

translation.en: -Go, go, go! -[Randy screams]
Real arrows flying at us! Real arrows flying at us!
♪ Dig the poo hole ♪
translation.it: Fai la buca per la pupù

translation.en: ♪ Dig, dig, dig ♪
-[Dora] Run! -Look away! Look away!
-Sorry, no time! -We saw nothing!
-Run for your life! -We gotta go!
-[Sammy] What is happening? -It's the curse!
The curse is gonna perish us. We're gonna perish all over the place!
translation.it: La maledizione ci farà perire! Periremo tutti!

translation.en: There, there! Follow me!
[Dora] This way!
I'm hit! They hit me! I'm bleeding out!
I am losing life force!
Oh, no, no, no! No, it's a juice box. It's just a juice box.
translation.it: No, è succo di frutta! È solo succo!

translation.en: I think we're safe. For now.
translation.it: Credo che siamo salvi, per il momento.

translation.en: -[Sammy screams] -Not safe. Not safe! Not safe!
[Randy] I want to go home! I want to go home!
I'm okay! I'm okay!
[Alejandro] Guys…
I can't say for sure…
because I'm… I'm fairly confident I just sustained a…
translation.it: perché sono piuttosto sicuro di aver subito una commozione cerebrale,

translation.en: a serious brain injury, but I do believe…
translation.it: perché sono piuttosto sicuro di aver subito una commozione cerebrale, ma sono convinto…

translation.en: we may have just met Los Guardianes Perdidos.
translation.it: che abbiamo appena incontrato Los Guardianes Perdidos.

translation.en: The Lost Guardians.
[Diego] I thought you said they were just legends.
translation.it: Avevi detto che era solo una leggenda.

translation.en: These are the same Inca sun symbols that were on those totems.
translation.it: È lo stesso simbolo inca del sole che era sui totem.

translation.en: So these are like, legit arrows?
Like, kill-people arrows?
[Alejandro] The markings are quite authentic.
Hey, you okay?
"Okay?"
Okay? No, I'm not okay, okay? I want to go home!
translation.it: Ok? No, non è tutto ok, ok? Voglio tornare a casa!

translation.en: I want to be staring at my phone, in an ice-cold room,
translation.it: Fissare il telefono in una stanza gelida

translation.en: drinking a frozen coffee beverage!
translation.it: mentre bevo una bibita ghiacciata al caffè.

translation.en: And I know that makes me sound real basic, but that is what I want!
translation.it: Vi sembrerò molto borghese, ma questo è ciò che voglio!

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, the poo song lied.
translation.it: E poi la canzone della pupù mente.

translation.en: Yeah, it was totally dangerous, arrows rained down on me.
I hate it here!
And I can't even storm off 'cause this jungle will eat me!
translation.it: E non posso andarmene infuriata, questa giungla mi divorerebbe!

translation.en: Maybe a song will help.
♪ It's okay to freak out sometimes ♪
translation.it: Capita a tutti un attacco di nervi

translation.en: -♪ It's really okay… ♪ -No more songs!
translation.it: Capita un attacco… Niente più canzoni!

translation.en: Okay.
Are you here to yell at me, too?
translation.it: Sei qui per sgridarmi anche tu?

translation.en: Nah. Actually, I'm here to avoid getting yelled at.
translation.it: No. Anzi, sono qui per salvarmi dagli strilli.

translation.en: It's scary to be responsible for other people.
translation.it: Fa paura sentirsi responsabili per gli altri.

translation.en: It's easier when you're alone.
translation.it: È più facile quando si è da soli.

translation.en: Is it?
Look, I know she can be like, a real pain in the butt sometimes, but…
translation.it: Senti, lo so che può sembrare una vera rompiscatole a volte, ma…

translation.en: she's not all bad, I guess.
translation.it: non è poi così male. Credo.

translation.en: You have an attraction for her.
What? No.
No, I definitely never said that.
translation.it: Non ho mai detto una cosa del genere.

translation.en: You know, a life-threatening situation
can often accelerate the mating process in many species!
translation.it: il processo di accoppiamento accelera in molte specie.

translation.en: Okay, no. Just slow your roll.
And please don't ever say the word "mating" again.
translation.it: E non usare più il termine "accoppiamento".

translation.en: -Ever. -Mm. Mm-hmm.
Let's just get out of here.
-Are we even going the right way? -[Boots laughs]
translation.it: Almeno questa sarà la direzione giusta?

translation.en: What?
Fox tracks.
[Viper] I scouted the area. There's a freshly cut path to the north,
translation.it: Ho perlustrato la zona. C'è un sentiero fresco verso nord e delle rovine a est.

translation.en: some ruins to the east.
translation.it: C'è un sentiero fresco verso nord e delle rovine a est.

translation.en: [Powell] Did you find any more of their markings?
-[Viper] No. -[Powell] Okay, then we head north. [Viper] That's the path they took.
translation.it: - Allora andiamo a nord. - È dove vanno loro.

translation.en: -Hi, guys! -[all gasp, hush]
[Viper] What was that?
What, you're scared of monkeys now?
[Viper] Monkeys can carry three times their body weight.
translation.it: Quelle sollevano tre volte il loro peso.

translation.en: So that's a yes? Viper's scared of monkeys.
translation.it: Quindi sì? Viper ha paura delle scimmie.

translation.en: It's just a monkey fact.
translation.it: È una cosa che si sa sulle scimmie,

translation.en: That's all it is.
[Sammy] Where are those guys?
[Randy] They're definitely dead. It's just you and me now.
translation.it: Sono sicuramente morti. Siamo rimasti solo noi due.

translation.en: -Of course, we'll have to start a family. -We are not starting a family.
translation.it: Certo, dovremo mettere su famiglia. Non metteremo su famiglia.

translation.en: Eh, give it a few days.
Uh! Hey! Where have you guys been?
-[Alejandro] Hi, guys. -Look, I'm really sorry, Dora.
translation.it: - Ciao. - Senti, ti chiedo scusa, Dora.

translation.en: It's fine. It's fine, Sammy.
We saw the mercenaries. They're ahead of us.
translation.it: Abbiamo visto i mercenari. Sono avanti a noi.

translation.en: We'll have to follow the mercenaries from a safe distance.
translation.it: Li seguiremo a distanza di sicurezza.

translation.en: No. We're not following them. My parents didn't go that way.
translation.it: No, i miei non sono andati di là.

translation.en: My father says that the way to Parapata passes through an opera house.
translation.it: Mio padre dice che la strada per Parapata attraversa un teatro dell'opera,

translation.en: The opera house was built hundreds of years ago
by Europeans during the rubber boom.
There'll be nothing but ruins by now.
This is the way they went.
This must be it.
Or was it.
It doesn't look like any opera singers have been here for a while.
translation.it: Sembrerebbe che non ci cantino da un bel po'.

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
The Europeans may have built it, but…
translation.it: Gli europei l'avranno pure costruito, ma…

translation.en: the jungle has taken it back.
-[farting sound] -Ew, my feet.
translation.it: dentro alla mia testa I miei piedi.

translation.en: Why does the ground feel like chocolate pudding?
-[farting sound] -Excuse me.
-[laughing] -[Alejandro] Wait, wait, wait!
I ate a lot of frijoles and chimichangas.
translation.it: Ho esagerato con frijoles e chimichangas!

translation.en: -I ate chile con carne. -[farting sound]
[Alejandro] I ate mucho pozole.
Wait. Anyone else notice the walls are getting higher?
translation.it: Aspettate, avete notato che le pareti si stanno alzando?

translation.en: -Quicksand! -[Sammy yelps]
-You got to be kidding me! -[Randy] Quicksand really exists?
translation.it: Non ci credo! Le sabbie mobili esistono?

translation.en: I thought it was just a video game thing. Like Pitfall!
translation.it: Credevo fosse solo una cosa da videogiochi, come Pitfall!

translation.en: -It's a classic. -How do we get out of this stuff?
translation.it: È un classico. Come usciamo da qui?

translation.en: Okay, rule number one of quicksand, don't panic.
You'll only get sucked in further. Lie down flat on your back.
translation.it: o le sabbie vi inghiottiranno. Stendetevi sulla schiena.

translation.en: You have to distribute your weight.
Okay. All right.
[Alejandro] No, no, no. I'm not doing that.
Yeah. No, this feels super wrong.
[Dora] Now make little movements with your legs
translation.it: Fate piccoli movimenti con le gambe

translation.en: to make space for the water to get between the sand.
translation.it: per far penetrare l'acqua nella sabbia.

translation.en: And once your legs are free, simply backstroke out of the quicksand.
translation.it: Una volta liberate le gambe, uscite a dorso dalle sabbie mobili.

translation.en: Oh, give me a break. We're gonna die in here.
translation.it: Falla finita, tanto qui ci moriremo!

translation.en: Look, look! It's working! It's working!
Come on.
Thanks.
-Help me! -Alejandro, you have to stop moving.
translation.it: Aiutatemi! Alejandro, smetti di muoverti, stai…

translation.en: Stay sti--
Why have you all gone quiet?
It's bad, isn't it? [yelps]
Oh, no! Shoo!
Cha! [spits] No, no, no! Not on the face.
-It's another male. They will now fight. -No, no!
translation.it: È un altro maschio! Combatteranno. No, no!

translation.en: I'm not sure those guys are fighting.
translation.it: Non sono certo che stiano combattendo.

translation.en: Oh, it's a female.
They are not fighting. They are mating!
-Get it off! -Quick, someone go get a branch.
-I'm sinking! -No, no, wait!
Guys, come back!
[Diego] It's a jungle full of trees and I can't find a branch.
translation.it: È una giungla piena di alberi e non trovo un ramo!

translation.en: [Sammy] Oh, oh, no!
[Dora] Alejandro! Alejandro!
I see feet. Human feet!
translation.it: Vedo dei piedi… dei piedi umani!

translation.en: Over here!
[Dora yelps] Okay, everyone. One, two, three! Ah!
translation.it: Forza, tutti insieme! Uno, due… e tre!

translation.en: -I'm alive? -[both] Yes!
-I'm alive! I'm alive! -Yes! Yes!
-I'm alive! I'm alive! [laughing] -Yes! [chuckling]
[sobbing] I'm alive, I'm alive…
I thought I was gonna die.
I thought I was gonna die.
It's so awkward when adults cry.
translation.it: È imbarazzante quando gli adulti piangono,

translation.en: You just don't know where to look.
And I was stupid!
And then a scorpion went…
translation.it: E poi gli scorpioni si sono messi…

translation.en: mating on my head.
I'm so sorry. My whole life is a lie.
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto. Tutta la mia vita è una menzogna.

translation.en: I'm a fraud.
-No! No. -Yes.
Everyone thinks that sometimes, Alejandro.
translation.it: Capita a tutti di pensarlo, Alejandro.

translation.en: I'm a bad guy.
-No. -Yes.
-No. No. No. -No, yes, I am. Yes.
-I'm a-- I'm a bad guy! [scoffs] -No!
No, you are not a bad guy. No one is, deep down inside.
translation.it: Non è vero che sei cattivo. Nel profondo, nessuno lo è.

translation.en: -Thank you, Dora. -Come on.
Where are we?
Someone lives here.
And that someone's coming.
She hasn't seen my parents.
translation.it: Non ha visto i miei genitori.

translation.en: And she doesn't seem very interested in helping me find them.
translation.it: Non mi pare molto interessata ad aiutarmi a trovarli.

translation.en: Perhaps she knows how to get to Parapata.
translation.it: Forse sa come arrivare a Parapata.

translation.en: [Sammy yelps] She seemed pretty interested in that.
Are they supposed to be us?
That seemed bad, right?
-Everyone thinks that was bad? -Yeah, a little bit.
translation.it: - Lo pensate anche voi? - Sì, un po'.

translation.en: What? What did she say?
She said anyone seeking Parapata is cursed.
translation.it: Che chiunque insegua Parapata è maledetto.

translation.en: -Well, that's great. -[Diego sighs]
But she also said she knows how to get you guys back downriver.
translation.it: Ma dice anche che sa come farvi tornare indietro.

translation.en: -She can take you home. -[scoffs]
All of you.
Yes. Yes! I am saved! I…
mean… [clears throat] …only if you are cool without us, obviously.
translation.it: sono… Solo se pensi di cavartela senza di noi, ovvio.

translation.en: You got me into this mess, but I guess you're getting me out of it,
translation.it: Mi hai trascinata in questo pasticcio, ma ora me ne tiri fuori,

translation.en: so we'll call it even.
I'm coming with you. I can't let you go alone.
translation.it: Io vengo con te. Non posso lasciarti andare da sola.

translation.en: I mean, plus you're my cousin. There's, like, rules about that.
translation.it: E poi sei mia cugina, esistono delle regole al riguardo.

translation.en: This is where we split up.
translation.it: Qui le nostre strade si separano.

translation.en: Oh, my…
I, uh… I hope you don't die or anything.
translation.it: Ti… auguro di non morire o altro.

translation.en: You, too.
Is she staring at us?
-Yeah. -Okay, time to go.
Diego, Dora, let's go.
-Hmm? -She says stick to the path.
Oh. Let's go. Bye, guys.
Good luck, Dora.
-[speaking Quechua] -Why is she in such a hurry to get us out of here?
translation.it: Perché ha tanta fretta di farci andare via?

translation.en: Randy, wait, stop.
Oh, no. Oh, no!
No, no, no, come on! We've got to warn them!
Not something you see every day.
translation.it: Non è qualcosa che si vede tutti i giorni.

translation.en: [Alejandro] Are you sure about this?
[Dora] Well, she said this was the way we had to go.
translation.it: Ha detto di andare in questa direzione.

translation.en: Don't touch anything.
Yes! Yes! Yes! We did it!
-We're in a spore field! -Don't breathe it in!
translation.it: È un campo di spore! - Non respirate! - Usciamo da qui!

translation.en: -Let's get out of here! -It's okay. It's okay.
translation.it: - Non respirate! - Usciamo da qui! Va tutto bene.

translation.en: If these were poisonous spores, we'd all be dead by now.
translation.it: Se fossero spore velenose, saremmo morti.

translation.en: Come on, Diego-- Oh, whoa.
What?
-What? What? -Oh, boy.
What's happening?
-You… You look weird. -You look weird.
-No, you look weird. -You-- No, you.
translation.it: - No, tu sei strana. - No, tu.

translation.en: -No, you! You! -You! You! Him!
I don't need these clothes anymore!
translation.it: Questi vestiti non mi servono più!

translation.en: I'm sure this will pass. It's fine!
translation.it: Sono certa che passerà. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: Fine? Are you kidding me?
This is incredible! [grunts]
Hi, Dora!
Hi there, Map! Oh, I thought I lost you.
translation.it: Ciao, Mappa! Credevo di averti persa.

translation.en: You can never lose me. I'm always with you!
translation.it: Non mi perderai mai, sono sempre con te.

translation.en: -Hi, Dora. -[gasps]
Backpack!
My mouth is a zipper!
translation.it: La mia bocca è una cerniera!

translation.en: -Hi, Dora. -Hmm.
-I don't know you, small rock. -Oh.
-But it's nice to make your acquaintance. -Ah.
translation.it: Ma è un piacere fare la tua conoscenza.

translation.en: Everyone is here!
Look! Papi's journal!
Wait!
-[grunts] -You okay, Dora?
I can't. I'm not ready.
Take my hand. Let's try this together.
translation.it: Prendi la mia mano. Proviamoci insieme.

translation.en: [Dora] Sammy! Randy!
[both] We've got you, Dora.
Thanks, guys!
-[Randy] What do we do? -[Sammy] Oh, we should sing her a song.
She likes songs.
♪ Please be alive, Dora, don't be dead ♪
translation.it: Ti prego sopravvivi, Dora, non morire

translation.en: ♪ That sounds like something That you would have said ♪
translation.it: E chissà se è una canzone Che ti piace sentire

translation.en: -Oh, I'm not very good at this. -[Randy] It worked!
She's waking up.
-Randy? -Oh, thank goodness.
-[Boots grunts softly] -Boots!
-Hi. -You came back.
-You have a nice voice. -[Sammy] Well…
sometimes a song's the best idea.
translation.it: a volte cantare è una buona idea.

translation.en: But not often. Oh, and don't tell anyone I did that.
translation.it: Ma non sempre. E non raccontarlo a nessuno.

translation.en: You're going to be okay.
You know, Dora,
I never forgot about the jungle.
translation.it: non ho mai dimenticato la giungla.

translation.en: And you…
you were my best friend…
translation.it: tu eri la mia migliore amica.

translation.en: and my-- my first friend.
I'm glad I'm here with you, Dora.
translation.it: Sono felice di essere qui con te, Dora.

translation.en: I mean, this…
this is our next adventure, prima.
translation.it: è la nostra nuova avventura, prima.

translation.en: Our next adventure, primo.
I-- I had the weirdest dream.
The entrance to Parapata should be somewhere in these mountains.
translation.it: L'entrata di Parapata è da qualche parte tra queste montagne.

translation.en: Oh, that's great. For the first time,
I'm actually feeling really good about how things are--
translation.it: ho un buon presentimento riguardo a…

translation.en: [Randy] Ignore what I just said.
translation.it: Dimenticate ciò che ho appena detto.

translation.en: This was all hidden down here?
[sighs] Well, great. Now we're stuck in a hole.
translation.it: Fantastico, ora siamo sprofondati in una buca.

translation.en: Stars.
[both] It's a star map.
Classic us.
But the stars aren't in the correct place.
translation.it: Ma le stelle non sono posizionate correttamente.

translation.en: Awesome.
It's a jungle puzzle! [laughs]
I don't think this is a jungle puzzle.
translation.it: Non credo sia un enigma della giungla.

translation.en: Mainly because there's no such thing as a jungle puzzle.
Listen, I've seen several movies about the jungle.
translation.it: Senti, ho visto diversi film sulla giungla.

translation.en: To solve this, we have to get the stars in the right place.
translation.it: Per risolverlo, dobbiamo rimettere le stelle al posto giusto.

translation.en: And when we do, these big stone wheels will turn
translation.it: Allora, le grosse ruote di pietra gireranno sveleranno il tesoro.

translation.en: and the treasure will be revealed. [chuckles] It's gonna be awesome.
translation.it: Allora, le grosse ruote di pietra gireranno sveleranno il tesoro. Sarà fantastico.

translation.en: I just need to figure out how to move the first piece.
translation.it: Devo solo trovare il primo pezzo da spostare.

translation.en: Are you sure you should be touching that?
translation.it: Sicuro di voler toccare quella cosa?

translation.en: -[Diego] What is that? -[rattling]
That does not sound like a good noise.
translation.it: Questo rumore non mi piace per niente.

translation.en: Oh, wait. The stars are in the right position.
translation.it: Aspettate. Le stelle sono nel posto giusto.

translation.en: It's the southern hemisphere.
-I was just looking at it the wrong way. -It's still a jungle puzzle, right?
translation.it: Le guardavo dal verso sbagliato. È sempre un enigma della giungla, giusto?

translation.en: Oh! Oh! I don't think this is a jungle puzzle.
translation.it: Non credo sia un enigma della giungla.

translation.en: -This is a puquio. -[Sammy] What the flip is a puquio?
translation.it: - Questo è un puquio! - Che caspita è un puquio?

translation.en: It's an ancient underground aqueduct.
Inca engineers built some of the most elaborate irrigation systems ever devised.
translation.it: Gli ingegneri inca avevano sistemi di irrigazione molto sofisticati.

translation.en: -Water, from above, using gravity. -[ratcheting]
-Oh, oh! -Stop pulling levers, Randy! [screams]
Ah! I'm trying to find the off switch!
Okay, if this is an aqueduct, we just need to somehow open the sluice gate.
translation.it: Se questo è un acquedotto, bisogna aprire la paratoia.

translation.en: How do you know so much about aqueducts?
We learned about them last year in history class.
translation.it: L'abbiamo studiato a storia l'anno scorso.

translation.en: You were there. It was the week you wore a lot of red and pink.
translation.it: C'eri anche tu, sempre vestita di rosso e rosa.

translation.en: I look at you a lot, okay?
We need to find the sluice gate. Where is the sluice gate?
translation.it: Dobbiamo trovare la paratoia. Dov'è la paratoia?

translation.en: Please stop saying "sluice gate."
That must be the mechanism that controls the sluice gate.
translation.it: Quello dev'essere il meccanismo per la paratoia.

translation.en: That's what it's called, okay? We have bigger thing to deal with right now!
translation.it: Si chiama così! Abbiamo altri problemi, adesso!

translation.en: Everyone give me a hand. It's gonna take all of us.
translation.it: Datemi la mano, dovremo farlo insieme.

translation.en: -One, two, three! -[all inhale]
This is our last chance. It's now or never.
translation.it: È la nostra ultima possibilità, ora o mai più!

translation.en: -[gasps] -Who here can hold their breath for seven minutes?
translation.it: Chi riesce a trattenere il respiro per sette minuti?

translation.en: It's hard to tell with all of this water,
but I'm assuming none of your hands are raised.
This one's mine. [inhales]
Dora!
-Dora! -[Cole] What?
-[Elena] Oh, honey. Oh, honey! -[Cole] Dora!
-Mami! -Oh!
-My baby girl. -[Cole] Honey! Honey!
Randy did it! We're alive!
translation.it: Randy ce l'ha fatta! Siamo vivi!

translation.en: -Tía, tío. -Okay,
can somebody please tell me what's going on?
We were kidnapped by mercenaries who were after Parapata.
translation.it: Ci hanno rapito dei mercenari in cerca di Parapata.

translation.en: Oh, I did something epic! I'm basically a superhero!
translation.it: Ho fatto una cosa epica! Sono praticamente un supereroe!

translation.en: Hi, Dora's parents.
Okay, honey, who are all these people?
We're Dora's friends. From school.
translation.it: Siamo gli amici di Dora, di scuola.

translation.en: It's fine. Fine.
We're on a field trip.
And where are the mercenaries?
Alejandro saved us from them. And he's with us!
translation.it: Alejandro ci ha salvati da loro ed è qui con noi!

translation.en: -Who? -Your old friend.
-Alejandro, from the university. -You-- You sent him your journal.
translation.it: Gli hai spedito il tuo diario.

translation.en: My journal was stolen days before the expedition.
translation.it: Mi hanno rubato il diario poco prima della spedizione.

translation.en: -[radio beeps] -Bravo team…
this is Alpha leader.
You don't know him, do you?
translation.it: Voi non lo conoscete… dico bene?

translation.en: Oh. Miércoles.
-We found them. -[Elena] Honey, come here.
-Get back, kids. -Delta rendezvous point.
translation.it: - Indietro ragazzi. - Punto di incontro Delta.

translation.en: You have my location.
-You lied to me. -No, no, no, no, no.
translation.it: Mi hai mentito. No, no, no.

translation.en: -No, I outwitted you… -That's the same thing.
translation.it: - No, ti ho raggirato. - È la stessa cosa.

translation.en: …as I have outwitted every adversary that came before you.
translation.it: Come ho raggirato ogni avversario prima di te.

translation.en: Who would have believed that my greatest achievement,
translation.it: Chi avrebbe creduto che il mio più grande successo,

translation.en: the final act in a prosperous treasure-hunting career
translation.it: il finale perfetto di una florida carriera di cacciatore di tesori,

translation.en: would find me squaring off against a socially inept jungle nerd…
translation.it: mi avrebbe visto affrontare una disadattata nerd della giungla…

translation.en: -Hey, hey, hey! -…and three high school losers.
I don't know them, so whatever.
-[exhales] -Now, if you please…
you will lead me to Parapata.
But you can't get inside. It's impenetrable.
translation.it: Non riuscirai a entrarci, è impenetrabile.

translation.en: -"Impenetrable!" -That means you can't get inside.
-I know! -Okay.
Shut up!
You wouldn't want anything to happen to her…
translation.it: Non vuoi che le succeda qualcosa…

translation.en: now, would you?
-Of course not. -Good.
Good, good.
So, if everyone just plays nice, I'll get my gold,
translation.it: Se tutti si comportano bene, io avrò il mio oro…

translation.en: and you'll be on your way home safe and sound.
translation.it: e voi tornerete a casa sani e salvi.

translation.en: [scoffs] You're a smart family, right?
So, make the smart choice. Hmm?
[Alejandro] We're moving out! Let's go!
I'm so sorry. This is all my fault.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, è tutta colpa mia.

translation.en: If we do what he says, we'll be okay.
translation.it: Facciamo come dice e andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: [Dora] Sorry, I'm so sorry.
[both] No, we're sorry.
-We love you so much! -[Elena] It's our fault.
translation.it: - È colpa nostra. - Ti vogliamo tanto bene!

translation.en: Can you all shut up back there?
I've had to listen to your mindless positivity for three days!
translation.it: Ho sopportato la vostra irragionevole positività per tre giorni!

translation.en: Your relentless good-natured spirit is a holy nightmare!
translation.it: La vostra insopprimibile bontà d'animo è un vero incubo!

translation.en: So just shut up! Shut up!
-I'm so sorry about that. -Yeah-- Shut up!
No more talking.
And definitely no more singing.
Why have you stopped here?
This is it, isn't it?
-[Elena] No, no, no. It, uh-- -No, no, no.
-Hey, wait. -No, please, wait!
[Diego] It's real!
[Alejandro] We make camp tonight by those gates.
translation.it: Ci accampiamo alle porte della città.

translation.en: [claps] Come on. ¡Órale!
No, Boots, quit it! No!
Papi wants us to do what they say.
translation.it: Papi ha detto di fare come dicono.

translation.en: -What's going on back here? -[thud]
-Oops. -Kids! -[Randy squeals] -[Dora] Run!
Wow, it really is the deadliest weapon.
[Powell] Viper! What's going on back there?
Put that down.
What happened?
Viper got yo-yoed.
-Again? -Again.
Take the professors to the gate.
I spent days with these brats.
translation.it: Ho passato diversi giorni con quelle pesti.

translation.en: I know what they'll do next.
Randy! Where are you guys? [screams]
[Dora] Boots!
You shouldn't have done that!
So what if he's a double-crossing mercenary treasure hunter?
translation.it: Che importa se è un cacciatore di tesori mercenario doppiogiochista?

translation.en: My parents are gonna show him the treasure and he's gonna let us all go.
translation.it: I miei lo porteranno al tesoro e lui ci lascerà andare.

translation.en: He's gonna kill them… isn't he?
He's gonna kill all of us.
Oh, no.
I can't save them.
Not by myself.
I'm just a kid. [sighs]
You're not a kid.
But you're not a grownup either, Dora.
translation.it: Ma non sei nemmeno un'adulta, Dora.

translation.en: You're a teenager. It's a super confusing time.
translation.it: Sei un'adolescente. È una fase della vita molto confusa.

translation.en: But the fact is, you're right, you can't do it by yourself.
translation.it: Ma la verità è che hai ragione: non puoi farcela da sola.

translation.en: Good news is you have friends now.
translation.it: La buona notizia è che adesso hai degli amici.

translation.en: And together, anything is possible.
Boots, you can talk?
Boots. Hey, Boots. Boots, come on. Boots.
-Hey, did you guys hear that? -Uh. You talking to a monkey?
translation.it: - Avete sentito? - Tu che parli con una scimmia?

translation.en: -[Boots squeals] -No, no, Boots was talking to me.
translation.it: No, Boots che parlava con me.

translation.en: Maybe she hit her head. [chuckles]
Come on, guys, we have to save my parents.
translation.it: Coraggio, dobbiamo salvare i miei genitori.

translation.en: How? We are teenagers armed with yo-yos.
translation.it: Come? Siamo adolescenti armati di yo-yo.

translation.en: All Alejandro wants is the gold.
And if we can get inside Parapata, we can trade the treasure for my parents.
translation.it: Se riusciamo a entrare a Parapata, possiamo darglielo in cambio dei miei.

translation.en: But how are we going to get into Parapata? We're gonna figure it out. Together.
translation.it: Ma come facciamo a entrare a Parapata? Troveremo un modo, insieme.

translation.en: Tonight.
♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
translation.it: Guardia alla porta La guardia alla porta

translation.en: ♪ Swiper is guarding the gate ♪
translation.it: Swiper fa la guardia alla porta

translation.en: ♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
translation.it: Guardia alla porta La guardia alla porta

translation.en: Would you stop singing? It's unprofessional.
translation.it: La pianti di cantare? Non è professionale.

translation.en: How are we gonna get past him?
♪ Guarding the gate I'm guarding the gate ♪
translation.it: Guardia alla porta La guardia alla porta

translation.en: Whatcha got there? [gasps]
It's just a little frog.
Oh. Oh, man…
Good job, golden poison frog.
There must be a way to open the gates from the outside.
translation.it: Dev'esserci un modo per aprire la porta dall'esterno.

translation.en: [Sammy] Hey, guys, look at these.
Each one has a lever.
I was wrong about jungle puzzles, okay?
translation.it: Mi sbagliavo sugli enigmi della giungla.

translation.en: There is no such thing as a jungle puzzle.
translation.it: Gli enigmi della giungla non esistono.

translation.en: Wait, don't do that! Look. Traps.
translation.it: Fermo, non farlo. Guarda, sono trappole.

translation.en: Could be arrows, or poison.
It looks like there's traps everywhere.
This is one heavy security system.
So, how do we know which levers to pull? There are so many combinations.
translation.it: Come capiamo quale leva tirare? Le combinazioni sono infinite.

translation.en: What the--
Guys, look down.
[Randy and Dora] Looks like constellations.
Classic us. Again.
translation.it: Un classico di noi due, di nuovo.

translation.en: [Dora] This is Yawar Mayu, the Inca night sky.
translation.it: È lo Yawar Mayu, il cielo notturno inca.

translation.en: Ah. Look. Some of the stones retain the light longer.
translation.it: Guardate, alcune pietre trattengono la luce più a lungo.

translation.en: This is anka, the eagle.
Look.
And that's atuq, the fox.
translation.it: E questa è atuq, la volpe.

translation.en: That's… right there.
This one looks like a serpent.
-[Sammy] Are there any more? -[Diego] This one's otorongo, the jaguar.
translation.it: Ce ne sono altre? Questa è otorongo, il giaguaro.

translation.en: This must be the fourth lever.
Okay, but… which one should we pull first?
translation.it: Ok, ma… quale tiriamo per prima?

translation.en: Maybe we pull 'em all at once?
Well, that's a pretty big "maybe."
At least if we die, we all get to die together, right?
translation.it: Almeno, se moriamo, moriamo insieme, no?

translation.en: On three, we pull.
Ready?
One…
two…
three.
Okay. It's official. Movies lie.
translation.it: Ok, è ufficiale, il cinema mente.

translation.en: [Randy] It's a jungle puzzle.
It's a real freaking jungle puzzle.
translation.it: Un autentico… cavolo di enigma della giungla.

translation.en: That is so awesome! I'm sorry I doubted you, movies.
translation.it: È meraviglioso! Scusa se ho dubitato di te, cinema.

translation.en: [Dora] I've never seen anything like it.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto nulla del genere.

translation.en: This is the discovery of a lifetime! [chuckles]
translation.it: Questa è la scoperta della vita!

translation.en: [Diego] I guess this must be the temple.
The gold, right?
This is totally where the gold's hidden.
Everything the Inca treasured will be in here.
translation.it: Tutti i tesori degli Inca devono essere custoditi qui.

translation.en: But remember we're explorers, not treasure hunters.
translation.it: Ma ricordate… siamo esploratori, non cacciatori di tesori.

translation.en: We're not treasure hunters, but Alejandro sure is.
translation.it: Noi no, ma Alejandro lo è eccome.

translation.en: So let's be quick.
-[grunting] -Come on. I don't do last.
translation.it: Forza, io non arrivo mai ultima.

translation.en: It's empty.
I don't get it.
[Diego] I don't see any doors.
This can't be all that there is.
[Randy] I don't see any treasure.
[Diego] It was probably cleaned out by Spanish conquistadores.
translation.it: Sarà stato depredato dai conquistadores spagnoli.

translation.en: -Or the British. -Or the French.
translation.it: - O dagli inglesi. - O dai francesi.

translation.en: Or the Americans and the United Fruit Company.
translation.it: O dagli americani e la United Fruit Company.

translation.en: I found this bowl. Could be treasure.
translation.it: Ho trovato questa ciotola. Magari è preziosa.

translation.en: -That's a sun bowl. -[Boots squeals]
[Sammy] You tilt the bowls to reflect the sunlight.
translation.it: Si inclina per riflettere i raggi solari.

translation.en: So that must mean there's…
Look! There's an opening in the wall for the sun to shine in.
translation.it: Guardate, c'è una fessura per far entrare la luce del sole.

translation.en: [Dora] Well, this flashlight can be our sun. Here, Boots.
translation.it: Questa torcia può essere il nostro sole. Vai, Boots.

translation.en: -[Dora] Huh. -Now what?
We have to angle the bowl to the right place in the room.
-[Dora] Clearly, they loved geometry. -[Sammy] They fit together symmetrically.
translation.it: - Di certo amavano la geometria. - Sono perfettamente simmetrici.

translation.en: [both] The golden ratio! 51 degrees.
Okay, Randy, angle your bowl 51 degrees to Diego.
translation.it: Ok, Randy, inclina la ciotola di 51 gradi verso Diego.

translation.en: Okay, Diego to me.
Okay.
Now, I'll turn mine 51 degrees and we'll see where it lands.
translation.it: Ora giro io di 51 gradi e vediamo dove cade.

translation.en: [gasps] A door! It's opening a door, guys.
translation.it: Un portale! Sta aprendo un portale!

translation.en: Just hold the beam until the doors are fully open.
translation.it: Restate così finché non si apre completamente.

translation.en: What is that? Some sort of Ancient Inca group hug?
translation.it: Cos'è? Una specie di abbraccio di gruppo inca?

translation.en: It slipped. I'm sorry.
-Oh, guys. You might want to look up. -Huh?
The jungle puzzles are turning on us!
-The door's closing! -Everyone run!
-Come on, Boots! -[Boots screams]
Dora, Dora! Try and pull it open.
-It isn't enough! -[Boots grunting]
-[Dora strains] -[ratcheting]
Thank you! Thank you!
Oh, Boots. [laughs] Good job, buddy!
Whoa. That's some hallway.
[Diego] It's like it goes on forever.
-At the end, is that-- -A giant golden monkey? [laughs]
translation.it: - In fondo non c'è… - Una gigantesca scimmia d'oro?

translation.en: [Randy] We did it, guys. We found the treasure.
translation.it: È fatta, ragazzi. Abbiamo trovato il tesoro!

translation.en: Wait, these skulls, they look like a--
-…warning. -[loud groaning]
Oh, come on!
[gasps] Spears!
Okay! Okay, I know what we have to do.
When we get to the bottom of the hallway, we have to jump at the same time.
translation.it: Arriviamo in fondo e saltiamo insieme.

translation.en: -It's too far! -What? We will never make it!
translation.it: - È troppo lontano. - Cosa? Non ce la faremo mai!

translation.en: No, it's an illusion, okay? Trust me.
-[breathes heavily] -It's okay, Sammy. Just let go. It's okay.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, Sammy, lasciati andare.

translation.en: Okay.
Three, two, one. Go!
Now! Jump!
It was a forced perspective. A trick to fool thieves and trespassers!
translation.it: Era una prospettiva forzata. Un trucco per ingannare ladri e intrusi.

translation.en: -Good job, Diego. -Ancient Inca group hug for the win, guys.
translation.it: Bravissimo, Diego! Abbraccio di gruppo inca per festeggiare!

translation.en: [Randy] The monkey looked a lot more impressive back there.
translation.it: La scimmia faceva molta più impressione lì in fondo.

translation.en: Looks pretty impressive to me.
-Is that an emerald? -[Sammy] It's bigger than a basketball!
translation.it: - È uno smeraldo? - È più grosso di un pallone.

translation.en: I think we found the treasure, guys.
This is the last puzzle.
Look.
This is a quipu.
Inca written language.
"Make an offering to the Gods…
of that which is most revered."
translation.it: di ciò che è… più venerato."

translation.en: What did the Inca revere the most?
[Alejandro] That's easy!
The same as me.
Gold.
Oh, crud.
Thanks for getting through the tough stuff for me.
translation.it: Grazie per aver fatto il lavoro sporco.

translation.en: Once again, I only had to follow Miss Know-It-All,
translation.it: Ancora una volta, ho solo dovuto seguire Miss Saputella

translation.en: and she led me straight to the gold. [laughs]
translation.it: e lei mi ha portato dritto all'oro.

translation.en: Gold. Gold! [laughs]
Lots and lots of gold!
The answer to the puzzle is obvious.
The Incas built monuments to their gods with it.
translation.it: Gli Inca l'hanno usato per innalzare monumenti ai loro dei.

translation.en: Gold is as close to touching the sun as the Incas could get.
translation.it: L'oro era la cosa più vicina al sole che gli Inca potevano toccare.

translation.en: It's happening! [laughs] It's happening!
It's happening! [laughs]
I beat you! I won!
translation.it: Vi ho battuto, ho vinto io!

translation.en: I beat you, I won! I beat you, I won! Ha!
translation.it: Vi ho battuto, ho vinto io! Vi ho battuto, ho vinto io!

translation.en: The treasure is going to be mine!
You were wrong about me, Alejandro.
translation.it: Ti sbagliavi su di me, Alejandro,

translation.en: I'm not a know-it-all.
But by now, I do know you.
translation.it: Però ormai ho imparato a conoscerti.

translation.en: I knew that you would follow us in here.
translation.it: Sapevo che ci avresti seguiti fin qui.

translation.en: And I knew that you would let us take all the risk for you.
translation.it: Sapevo che avresti fatto correre tutti i rischi a noi

translation.en: I knew the final Inca test would carry
translation.it: e che l'ultima prova sarebbe costata molto cara a chi l'avesse fallita.

translation.en: dire consequences for those who should fail it.
translation.it: sarebbe costata molto cara a chi l'avesse fallita.

translation.en: Which is why we are over here, and you…
translation.it: Ragion per cui, noi… siamo qui, mentre tu…

translation.en: Well, you're standing right there.
translation.it: Beh, te ne stai proprio lì in mezzo.

translation.en: [Alejandro] I'm still alive!
[radio chirps] Powell! Viper!
Help me! Get in here! Now!
My mercenaries are on their way.
This isn't over yet!
-Dora! -Oh, honey!
-Mami! Papi! I'm so sorry. -[grunting]
It's fine. How cool is this?
Look at these guys, that's a real crossbow.
Honey. That's a real crossbow, yep.
It's the Lost Guardians of Parapata.
translation.it: Sono i Guardiani Perduti di Parapata.

translation.en: Ridiculous! There are no lost guardians. I made them up.
translation.it: Ridicolo! I Guardiani non esistono, li ho inventati io.

translation.en: No, they're super real, bro.
I think this is when we perish.
translation.it: Credo sia il momento di perire.

translation.en: -[speaking Quechua] -Dora!
translation.it: No! Per favore! Non siamo con lui.

translation.en: -Be strong, honey, okay? -You choose the right thing.
-[shushes] -Yep.
-[both sigh] -She did it.
-Thank you. Yeah. -Thank you.
Honey.
[gasps] It's like nothing I've…
translation.it: È qualcosa che non avrei mai…

translation.en: -ever imagined. -Ever imagined.
It's breathtaking.
Monkey.
Really big gold monkey. [laughs]
[Swiper] Say goodbye to your little friend.
What is happening?
-Swiper! -Adiós, losers!
Everyone get out of here!
-What about the gold? -It doesn't matter!
Wait, guys! What about me?
You can't leave me here!
Dora! Randy! Help me!
We're a team! Guys!
[Sammy] Dora, come on!
[Alejandro] I knew the answer was water!
Can you give me another go?
I was joking about the gold! Of course not gold!
translation.it: Scherzavo sull'oro, è ovvio che non è l'oro.

translation.en: Water is precious!
Honey, let's go!
And you'll never find it now, man!
We gotta go! I love Parapata, but I don't want to be stuck here forever.
translation.it: Forza! Io amo Parapata, ma non voglio restarci per sempre.

translation.en: -Boots! -[Swiper] Get off me, monkey!
Oh, man. The indignity!
That's it.
-[Elena] Dora, no! -[Cole] Dora, wait!
[Elena] What are you doing?
[Elena] Dora! You did it!
Should we put up a sign saying, "Choose the water"?
translation.it: Vogliamo mettere un cartello che dica: "Scegliete l'acqua"?

translation.en: -[laughter] -No? Okay.
Look, I know we weren't exactly friends when this trip started, but I--
translation.it: So che non eravamo proprio amici all'inizio di questo viaggio, ma io…

translation.en: I like you, too.
-Dora's staring at us again, isn't she? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Dora ci sta fissando, vero? - Sì.

translation.en: Okay.
Mom, Dad!
We have some exciting news.
We're going back into the jungle in a few weeks.
translation.it: Torniamo nella giungla tra qualche settimana.

translation.en: We'll be gone for a few months, no contact, -just us against the elements. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Spariremo per mesi, nessun contatto, solo noi contro gli elementi…

translation.en: Me and your mom.
And you.
We're onto something big, Dora.
About that.
[Randy] Someone pulled a lever, not sure who, but--
-You. You! -[Diego] You know who it was.
translation.it: - Sei stato tu! - Tu sai chi è stato!

translation.en: I think…
I think I want to go back to the city.
translation.it: Credo di voler tornare in città.

translation.en: I know the jungle pretty well.
-Okay. -But, um, high school…
I think I need more time to study that culture.
translation.it: Ho bisogno di altro tempo per capire la cultura…

translation.en: And its indigenous people.
-Right. Yeah, sure. -Yeah. Yeah. Uh-huh.
-That's good. -I love you guys.
-We love you, too. -We love you, sweetheart.
translation.it: - Anche noi. - Anche noi, amore mio.

translation.en: -[both sobbing] -Oh, God, what is happening?
-She has a life of her own now. -I'm so happy for her.
translation.it: - Adesso ha una sua vita. - Sono tanto felice per lei.

translation.en: I'm so happy.
It's gonna be okay, babe. It's gonna be okay.
It's not gonna be okay!
[Cole continues sobbing] But I'm so happy for her.
translation.it: Ma sono tanto felice per lei.
